channel.title: Interested in being in youtube videos for BF3/Minecraft/& More? (Xbox 360)
channel.description:
I recently purchased a capture card so I could expand my youtube channel to more than just Runescape videos which few people watched. I wanted a capture card for a while and I have only had it for a few days but I love it so much.
I have a good amount of games but the ones I play the most are Battlefield 3 and Minecraft (Xbox 360 version). I should also mention I only have an xbox 360, sorry PS3 users. I'm pretty good at Battlefield 3 and I love playing minecraft with a lot of people. I also have Halo 4 and I want to get black ops 2.
However, I have no one to play BF3 with and if I have 1-2 people in squad with me and we were chatting it up and going ham, that could make for some good videos. Also, 4+ people playing minecraft and surviving and building could make great videos too. The only people I have been able to find to play minecraft with me are young kids that are annoying as fuck. I don't mind anyone who is young as long as they aren't annoying.
Here is my youtube channel: http://youtube.com/marcbobvideos
If you're interested in being in videos of mine or just playing with me, please leave a comment and I'll hit you up.

item.title: Interested in being in youtube videos for BF3/Minecraft/& More? (Xbox 360)
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:5, topic:516131”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=634389.msg4283193#msg4283193 date=1365990524]
I’ve got Black Ops 1 & 2, MW2, and WaW. On the Halo side I’ve got 1, 2, 3, 4, Reach, and Anniversary edition.
I do decently a lot on Black Ops 2. I could get some scenes for ya
[/quote]

Oh, do they have like a theatre mode so you could send me them somehow?[/quote]
Yes, bops2 has a theatre. It can also take all of your kills for the match and mash them up into a short little teaser video.

Read full topic
